attributes.action: Honour Mr. Drew (educating Essex) with an MBE
attributes.additional_details:
Mr. Drew (star of Channel 4's "Educating Essex") should be recognised for his services to education.

He has clearly made a significant difference to the lives of many young people and is an ideal role model for Britain's youth.

Mr. Drew should be awarded an MBE for his dedication and professionalism, as well as his commitment to improve the prospects of the children under his tutelage.
